title: Breaking point
creator_contributor_role: South Australian Film Corporation, production company

description: Looks at mental breakdown and the treatment of mental disorders by presenting a dramatisation of 2 case studies : a young girl suffering from schizophrenia and a middle aged man who is depressive. Cast includes Marcia Deane-Johns, Leo Taylor, Barbara West, Wayne Bell, Shane Withington.
